[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@webmate/editor](./editor.md) &gt; [Editor](./editor.editor.md) &gt; [onSave](./editor.editor.onsave.md)

## Editor.onSave property

Sets the `isSaved` property of the editor context to `true`<!-- -->. This method can be used as an event handler for a "save" button or similar functionality in the editor.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onSave: () => void;
```

## Example


```html
const editor = document.querySelector('webmate-editor');
document.addEventListener('@webmate/editor/save', (event) => {
  fetch('/api/page/save', {
    method: 'POST',
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    },
    body: JSON.stringify(event.detail)
  });
  editor.onSave();
});
```
